title: The Real Reason You Procrastinate
description: You procrastinate because you're lazy, right? Wrong. The truth is more complex—and far more interesting. Learn how to stop putting off important tasks ... with a little help from master procrastinator Margaret Atwood.
itunes:subtitle: You procrastinate because you're lazy, right? Wrong.
author: podcasts@ted.com (TED)
